00135 MainFrame::~MainFrame( )
00136 {
00137         if( this->m_loaded_doc)
00138         {
00139                 delete this->m_loaded_doc;
00140                 this->m_loaded_doc= (ConfigDoc*) 0;
00141         }
00142         if( this->m_app_settings) {
00143                 delete this->m_app_settings;
00144                 this->m_app_settings= NULL;
00145     }
00146     this->m_main_toolbar->PopEventHandler( true);
00147 }

00153 bool MainFrame::Create( wxWindow* parent, wxWindowID id, const wxString& caption, const wxPoint& pos, const wxSize& size, long style )
00154 {
00155     this->m_updating = true;
00156

00175 
00176     m_pllset_clkin_dblcontrol = NULL;
00177         wxFileName fn( MainFrame::GetExecutablePath());
00178         wxFileName::SetCwd( fn.GetPath());
00179         
00180         //
00181         // Load application settings
00182         this->m_app_settings= new AppSettings( );
00183 
00184         // 
00185         // Load Application settings
00186         if( !this->m_app_settings->Load( ))
00187         {
00188                 wxLogError( _("Error loading application settings ..."));
00189                 return false;
00190         }
00191 
00193     wxFrame::Create( parent, id, caption, pos, size, style );
00194 
00195     this->SetFont(wxFont(9, wxSWISS, wxNORMAL, wxNORMAL, false, _T("Verdana")));
00196     CreateControls();
00197     SetIcon(GetIconResource(wxT("app_icon.ico")));
00198     Centre();
00200         
00201     this->m_updating = false;
00202 
00203         if( !this->UpdateControls())
00204                 return false;
00205 
00206     Centre();
00207         this->Layout();
00208         return true;
00209 }
00210 
00211 wxString MainFrame::GetExecutablePath()
00212 {
00213     static bool found = false;
00214     static wxString path;
00215 
00216     if (found)
00217         return path;
00218     else
00219     {
00220 #ifdef __WXMSW__
00221 
00222         char buf[512];
00223         *buf = '\0';
00224         GetModuleFileName(NULL, buf, 511);
00225         path = buf;
00226 
00227 #elif defined(__WXMAC__)
00228 
00229         ProcessInfoRec processinfo;
00230         ProcessSerialNumber procno ;
00231         FSSpec fsSpec;
00232 
00233         procno.highLongOfPSN = NULL ;
00234         procno.lowLongOfPSN = kCurrentProcess ;
00235         processinfo.processInfoLength = sizeof(ProcessInfoRec);
00236         processinfo.processName = NULL;
00237         processinfo.processAppSpec = &fsSpec;
00238 
00239         GetProcessInformation( &procno , &processinfo ) ;
00240         path = wxMacFSSpec2MacFilename(&fsSpec);
00241 #else
00242         wxString argv0 = wxTheApp->argv[0];
00243 
00244         if (wxIsAbsolutePath(argv0))
00245             path = argv0;
00246         else
00247         {
00248             wxPathList pathlist;
00249             pathlist.AddEnvList(wxT("PATH"));
00250             path = pathlist.FindAbsoluteValidPath(argv0);
00251         }
00252 
00253         wxFileName filename(path);
00254         filename.Normalize();
00255         path = filename.GetFullPath();
00256 #endif
00257         found = true;
00258         return path;
00259     }
00260 }

00430     m_pllset_clkoutdelay_choice = new wxChoice( m_pll_settings_panel, ID_PLLSET_CLKOUTDELAY_CHOICE, wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize, 0, m_pllset_clkoutdelay_choiceStrings, 0 );
00431     m_pllset_clkoutdelay_choice->SetHelpText(_("Choose the clockout delay."));
00432     if (ShowToolTips())
00433         m_pllset_clkoutdelay_choice->SetToolTip(_("Choose the clockout delay."));
00434     m_pllset_clkoutdelay_choice->SetFont(wxFont(8, wxSWISS, wxNORMAL, wxNORMAL, false, _T("Arial")));
00435     itemBoxSizer36->Add(m_pllset_clkoutdelay_choice, 1, wxALIGN_BOTTOM|wxLEFT|wxRIGHT, 3);
00436 
00437     m_pll_settings_panel->FitInside();
00438

00440     m_main_toolbar->SetToolBitmapSize(wxSize(34, 34));
00441     wxBitmap itemtool39Bitmap(itemFrame1->GetBitmapResource(wxT("exit_34.png")));
00442     wxBitmap itemtool39BitmapDisabled;
00443     m_main_toolbar->AddTool(ID_EXIT_TOOL, _("Exit"), itemtool39Bitmap, itemtool39BitmapDisabled, wxITEM_NORMAL, _("Close application and exit to system."), _("Close application and exit to system."));
00444     m_main_toolbar->AddSeparator();
00445     wxBitmap itemtool41Bitmap(itemFrame1->GetBitmapResource(wxT("open.png")));
00446     wxBitmap itemtool41BitmapDisabled;
00447     m_main_toolbar->AddTool(ID_OPEN_TOOL, _("Open"), itemtool41Bitmap, itemtool41BitmapDisabled, wxITEM_NORMAL, _("Open a configuration file."), _("Open a configuration file."));
00448     wxBitmap itemtool42Bitmap(itemFrame1->GetBitmapResource(wxT("save.png")));
00449     wxBitmap itemtool42BitmapDisabled;
00450     m_main_toolbar->AddTool(ID_SAVE_TOOL, _("Save"), itemtool42Bitmap, itemtool42BitmapDisabled, wxITEM_NORMAL, _("Save configuration to file."), _("Save configuration to file."));
00451     m_main_toolbar->AddSeparator();
00452     wxBitmap itemtool44Bitmap(itemFrame1->GetBitmapResource(wxT("Magic-32x32.png")));
00453     wxBitmap itemtool44BitmapDisabled;
00454     m_main_toolbar->AddTool(ID_MAKE_OUTPUT_TOOL, _("Make output"), itemtool44Bitmap, itemtool44BitmapDisabled, wxITEM_NORMAL, _("Make an output file form current settings."), _("Make an output file form current settings."));
00455     wxBitmap itemtool45Bitmap(itemFrame1->GetBitmapResource(wxT("download.png")));

00458     m_main_toolbar->AddSeparator();
00459     wxBitmap itemtool47Bitmap(itemFrame1->GetBitmapResource(wxT("about_34.png")));
00460     wxBitmap itemtool47BitmapDisabled;
00461     m_main_toolbar->AddTool(ID_HELP_TOOL, _("About"), itemtool47Bitmap, itemtool47BitmapDisabled, wxITEM_NORMAL, _("About CAEN PLL config"), _("About CAEN PLL config"));
00462     m_main_toolbar->Realize();
00463     itemFrame1->SetToolBar(m_main_toolbar);
00464 
00465     m_main_statusbar = new wxStatusBar( itemFrame1, ID_MAIN_STATUSBAR, 0 );
00466     m_main_statusbar->SetFont(wxFont(8, wxSWISS, wxNORMAL, wxNORMAL, false, _T("Verdana")));
00467     m_main_statusbar->SetFieldsCount(2);
00468     int m_main_statusbarWidths[2];

00470     m_main_statusbarWidths[1] = -1;
00471     m_main_statusbar->SetStatusWidths(2, m_main_statusbarWidths);
00472     itemFrame1->SetStatusBar(m_main_statusbar);
00473 
00475 
00476         //
00477         // !!!!!  WARNING  !!!!
00478         //

00480         // The following code generated from designer (in the above section)

00483         //   m_pllset_clkin_control->SetHelpText(_("Set the input frequency (MHz)"));

00516 wxBitmap MainFrame::GetBitmapResource( const wxString& name )
00517 {
00518         // Bitmap retrieval
00520     wxUnusedVar(name);
00521     if (name == _T("exit_34.png"))
00522     {
00523         wxBitmap bitmap(_T("exit_34.png"), wxBITMAP_TYPE_PNG);
00524         return bitmap;
00525     }
00526     else if (name == _T("open.png"))
00527     {
00528         wxBitmap bitmap(_T("open.png"), wxBITMAP_TYPE_PNG);
00529         return bitmap;
00530     }
00531     else if (name == _T("save.png"))
00532     {
00533         wxBitmap bitmap(_T("save.png"), wxBITMAP_TYPE_PNG);
00534         return bitmap;
00535     }
00536     else if (name == _T("Magic-32x32.png"))
00537     {
00538         wxBitmap bitmap(_T("Magic-32x32.png"), wxBITMAP_TYPE_PNG);
00539         return bitmap;
00540     }
00541     else if (name == _T("download.png"))
00542     {
00543         wxBitmap bitmap(_T("download.png"), wxBITMAP_TYPE_PNG);
00544         return bitmap;
00545     }
00546     else if (name == _T("about_34.png"))
00547     {
00548         wxBitmap bitmap(_T("about_34.png"), wxBITMAP_TYPE_PNG);
00549         return bitmap;
00550     }
00551     return wxNullBitmap;
00553 }
00554 
00559 wxIcon MainFrame::GetIconResource( const wxString& name )
00560 {
00561         // Icon retrieval
00562     wxUnusedVar(name);
00563     if (name == _T("app_icon.ico"))
00564     {
00565         wxIcon icon(_T("app_icon.ico"), wxBITMAP_TYPE_ICO);
00566         return icon;
00567     }
00568     return wxNullIcon;
00569 }

00593 
00598 void MainFrame::OnCloseWindow( wxCloseEvent& event )
00599 {
00600         if( this->m_loaded_doc->IsDirty())
00601         {
00602                 switch( wxMessageBox( 
00603                         _("Do you want to save changes ?"), 
00604                         _( "Current document has changed !"), 
00605                         wxYES_NO| wxCANCEL| wxICON_QUESTION,
00606                         this))
00607                 {
00608                 case wxYES:
00609                         this->DoSaveConfig();
00610                         break;
00611                 case wxCANCEL:
00612                         return;
00613                 }
00614         }
00615 
00616         if( this->m_app_settings)
00617         {
00618                 {
00619             this->m_app_settings->SetVMEClkinFreq( this->m_pllset_clkin_dblcontrol->GetValue());
00620                         wxMutexLocker lock( this->m_app_settings->m_mutex);
00621                         this->m_app_settings->Save();
00622                 }
00623                 delete this->m_app_settings;
00624                 this->m_app_settings= NULL;
00625         }
00626     event.Skip();
00627 }
00628 
00629 
00630 
00631 bool MainFrame::UpdateControls( void)
00632 {
00633         wxMutexLocker lock( this->m_app_settings->m_mutex);
00634 
00635         this->m_pllset_board_type_control->Clear();
00636         //this->m_pllset_board_type_control->Append( _(""), (void*)0);
00637 
00638         for( unsigned int i= 0; i< this->m_app_settings->m_board_array.GetCount(); i++)
00639         {
00640                 this->m_pllset_board_type_control->Append( ((GenericBoard*)this->m_app_settings->m_board_array[i])->GetTypeString(), this->m_app_settings->m_board_array[i]);
00641         }
00642         this->m_pllset_board_type_control->SetSelection( 0);
00643 
00644         this->m_pllset_clkoutfreq_choice->Enable( this->m_pllset_clkouten_control->GetValue());
00645         this->m_pllset_clkoutdelayen_control->Enable( this->m_pllset_clkouten_control->GetValue());
00646         this->m_pllset_clkoutdelay_choice->Enable( this->m_pllset_clkoutdelayen_control->GetValue()&& this->m_pllset_clkouten_control->GetValue());
00647 
00648         //this->m_pllset_plldiv_control->Enable( this->m_pllset_clkmod_control->GetSelection()== 0);
00649         this->m_pllset_clkin_label->Enable( this->m_pllset_clkmod_control->GetSelection()== 0);
00650         this->m_pllset_vcxo_type_control->Enable( this->m_pllset_clkmod_control->GetSelection()== 0);
00651         this->m_pllset_read_vcxo_type_control->Enable( this->m_pllset_clkmod_control->GetSelection()== 0);
00652 
00653         //this->m_pllset_clkin_dblcontrol->Enable( this->m_pllset_clkmod_control->GetSelection()!= 0);
00654 
00655         this->UpdateVCXOTypes();
00656     this->m_pllset_board_base_addr_control->SetValue(wxString::Format("%08x", (this->m_app_settings->GetVMEBaseAddreess())));
00657     this->m_pllset_clkin_dblcontrol->SetValue(this->m_app_settings->GetVMEClkinFreq()); // HACK
00658         this->UpdateOutput();
00659         return true;
00660 }

00675                 return false;
00676         //::wxMutexGuiEnter();
00677         MainFrame::g_main_statusbar->SetStatusText( text, pane_index);
00678         //::wxMutexGuiLeave();
00679         return true;
00680 }

00687 void MainFrame::OnOpenToolClick( wxCommandEvent& /*event*/ )
00688 {
00689         if( this->m_loaded_doc->IsDirty())
00690         {
00691                 switch( wxMessageBox( 
00692                         _("Do you want to save changes ?"), 
00693                         _( "Current document has changed !"), 
00694                         wxYES_NO| wxCANCEL| wxICON_QUESTION,
00695                         this))
00696                 {
00697                 case wxYES:
00698                         this->DoSaveConfig();
00699                         break;
00700                 case wxCANCEL:
00701                         return;
00702                 }
00703         }
00704         this->DoLoadConfig();
00705 }
00706 
00711 void MainFrame::OnSaveToolClick( wxCommandEvent& /*event*/ )
00712 {
00713         this->DoSaveConfig();
00714 }
00715 
00716 bool MainFrame::DoLoadConfig()
00717 {
00718         wxString filename= wxFileSelector( 
00719                 _("Select a PLL configuration file to load ..."), 
00720                 _(""),
00721                 _(""), 
00722                 _("cpc"),
00723                 _("CAEN PLL Configuration files (*.cpc)|*.cpc|All files (*.*)|*.*"), 
00724                 wxOPEN| wxFILE_MUST_EXIST, 
00725                 this);
00726         if( filename.IsEmpty())
00727                 return false;
00728 
00729         if( !this->m_loaded_doc->Load( filename))
00730                 return false;
00731 
00732         if( !this->SetControls())
00733                 return false;
00734 
00735         this->SetDirty( false);
00736         
00737         // Status bar update
00738         MainFrame::SetStsBarText( this->m_loaded_doc->GetFilename(), STS_BAR_PANE_FILENAME);
00739 
00740         return true;
00741 }
00742 bool MainFrame::DoSaveConfig()
00743 {
00744         if( !this->GetControls())
00745                 return false;
00746 
00747         wxString cfg_filename= this->m_loaded_doc->GetFilename();
00748         wxString path= _("");
00749         wxString name= _("");
00750         if( !cfg_filename.IsEmpty())
00751         {
00752                 wxFileName::SplitPath( cfg_filename, &path, &name, NULL);
00753         }
00754         wxString filename= wxFileSelector( 
00755                 _("Select a PLL configuration file to save ..."), 
00756                 path,
00757                 name, 
00758                 _("cpc"),
00759                 _("CAEN PLL Configuration files (*.cpc)|*.cpc|All files (*.*)|*.*"), 
00760                 wxSAVE| wxOVERWRITE_PROMPT, 
00761                 this);
00762         if( filename.IsEmpty())
00763                 return false;
00764 
00765         if( !this->m_loaded_doc->Save( filename))
00766                 return false;
00767 
00768         // Status bar update
00769         MainFrame::SetStsBarText( this->m_loaded_doc->GetFilename(), STS_BAR_PANE_FILENAME);
00770         return true;
00771 
00772 }
00773 bool MainFrame::SetControls()
00774 {
00775         for( unsigned int i= 0; i< this->m_pllset_board_type_control->GetCount(); i++)
00776         {
00777                 GenericBoard *board= ( GenericBoard *)this->m_pllset_board_type_control->GetClientData( i);
00778                 if( !board)
00779                         continue;
00780                 if( board->GetType()== this->m_loaded_doc->GetBoardType())
00781                 {
00782                         this->m_pllset_board_type_control->SetSelection( i);
00783                         break;
00784                 }
00785         }
00786         this->m_pllset_board_base_addr_control->SetValue( wxString::Format( "%04X", this->m_loaded_doc->GetBoardBaseAddress()));
00787         this->m_pllset_vcxo_type_control->SetStringSelection( wxString::Format( "%d", this->m_loaded_doc->GetVCXOFreq()));
00788         this->m_pllset_clkmod_control->SetSelection( this->m_loaded_doc->GetPLLMode()? 0: 1);
00789         this->m_pllset_clkin_dblcontrol->SetValue( this->m_loaded_doc->GetInputClock());
00790 
00791         this->UpdateOutput();
00792 
00793         this->m_pllset_clkouten_control->SetValue( this->m_loaded_doc->GetClockOutEnable());
00794         this->SelectByData( this->m_pllset_clkoutdelay_choice, this->m_loaded_doc->GetClockOutDelay());
00795         this->SelectByData( this->m_pllset_clkoutfreq_choice, this->m_loaded_doc->GetClockOutDivider());
00796         this->SelectByData( this->m_pllset_adcfreq_choice, this->m_loaded_doc->GetADCDivider());
00797 
00798         this->m_pllset_clkoutdelayen_control->SetValue( this->m_loaded_doc->GetClockOutDelayEnable());
00799 
00800         this->m_pllset_clkoutfreq_choice->Enable( this->m_pllset_clkouten_control->GetValue());
00801         this->m_pllset_clkoutdelayen_control->Enable( this->m_pllset_clkouten_control->GetValue());
00802         this->m_pllset_clkoutdelay_choice->Enable( this->m_pllset_clkoutdelayen_control->GetValue()&& this->m_pllset_clkouten_control->GetValue());
00803 
00804         this->m_pllset_clkin_label->Enable( this->m_pllset_clkmod_control->GetSelection()== 0);
00805         this->m_pllset_vcxo_type_control->Enable( this->m_pllset_clkmod_control->GetSelection()== 0);
00806         this->m_pllset_read_vcxo_type_control->Enable( this->m_pllset_clkmod_control->GetSelection()== 0);
00807 
00808 
00809         return true;
00810 }
00811 bool MainFrame::GetControls()
00812 {
00813         int sel;
00814         unsigned long board_addr;
00815         if( !this->m_pllset_board_base_addr_control->GetValue().ToULong( &board_addr, 16))
00816         {
00817                 wxLogError( _("Invalid board base address !"));
00818                 return false;
00819         }
00820         this->m_loaded_doc->SetBoardType( (( GenericBoard *)this->m_pllset_board_type_control->GetClientData( this->m_pllset_board_type_control->GetSelection()))->GetType());
00821         this->m_loaded_doc->SetBoardBaseAddress( ( UINT32)board_addr); 
00822 
00823         this->m_loaded_doc->SetClockOutEnable( this->m_pllset_clkouten_control->GetValue( ));
00824 
00825         //this->m_loaded_doc->SetClockOutDelay( this->m_pllset_clkoutdelay_control->GetValue( ));
00826         sel= this->m_pllset_clkoutdelay_choice->GetSelection();
00827         if( sel< 0) {
00828                 wxLogError( _("Output Clock delay not selected !"));
00829                 return false;
00830         }
00831         this->m_loaded_doc->SetClockOutDelay( ((IntClientData*)this->m_pllset_clkoutdelay_choice->GetClientObject( sel))->GetVal());
00832 
00833         //this->m_loaded_doc->SetInputClockDivider( this->m_pllset_plldiv_control->GetValue( ));
00834         long tmp= 0;
00835         this->m_pllset_vcxo_type_control->GetStringSelection( ).ToLong( &tmp);
00836         this->m_loaded_doc->SetVCXOFreq( (int)tmp);
00837         this->m_loaded_doc->SetPLLMode( this->m_pllset_clkmod_control->GetSelection()== 0);
00838         this->m_loaded_doc->SetInputClock( this->m_pllset_clkin_dblcontrol->GetValue( ));
00839         this->m_loaded_doc->SetClockOutDelayEnable( this->m_pllset_clkoutdelayen_control->GetValue( ));
00840 
00841         //this->m_loaded_doc->SetADCDivider( this->m_pllset_adcdivider_control->GetValue( ));
00842         sel= this->m_pllset_adcfreq_choice->GetSelection();
00843         if( sel< 0) {
00844                 wxLogError( _("Sampling frequency not selected !"));
00845                 return false;
00846         }
00847         this->m_loaded_doc->SetADCDivider( ((IntClientData*)this->m_pllset_adcfreq_choice->GetClientObject( sel))->GetVal());
00848 
00849         //this->m_loaded_doc->SetClockOutDivider( this->m_pllset_clkoutdivider_control->GetValue());
00850         sel= this->m_pllset_clkoutfreq_choice->GetSelection();
00851         if( sel< 0) {
00852                 wxLogError( _("Output Clock frequency not selected !"));
00853                 return false;
00854         }
00855         this->m_loaded_doc->SetClockOutDivider( ((IntClientData*)this->m_pllset_clkoutfreq_choice->GetClientObject( sel))->GetVal());
00856 
00857         return true;
00858 }
00859 
00860 void MainFrame::SetDirty( bool value)
00861 {
00862         if( this->m_loaded_doc)
00863                 this->m_loaded_doc->SetDirty( value);
00864 }
00869 void MainFrame::OnPllsetBoardTypeChoiceSelected( wxCommandEvent& /*event*/ )
00870 {
00871         if( this->m_updating)
00872                 return;
00873         this->SetDirty( true);
00874         this->UpdateOutput();
00875         this->UpdateVCXOTypes();
00876 }
00877 void MainFrame::UpdateVCXOTypes( void)
00878 {
00879         // Update VCXO types
00880         this->m_pllset_vcxo_type_control->Clear();
00881         if( this->m_pllset_board_type_control->GetSelection()< 0) 
00882                 return;
00883         GenericBoard *board= ( GenericBoard *)this->m_pllset_board_type_control->GetClientData( this->m_pllset_board_type_control->GetSelection());
00884         int type= 0;
00885         int freq= 0;
00886         while( board->GetVCXOFreq( type++, freq))
00887         {
00888                 wxString item= wxString::Format("%d", freq);
00889                 if( this->m_pllset_vcxo_type_control->FindString( item)< 0) {
00890                         this->m_pllset_vcxo_type_control->Append( item);
00891                 }
00892         }
00893     int index;
00894     if(( index= this->m_pllset_vcxo_type_control->FindString( "500"))>= 0)
00895         {
00896                 this->m_pllset_vcxo_type_control->SetSelection( index);
00897         }
00898     else
00899                 this->m_pllset_vcxo_type_control->SetSelection( 0);
00900 
00901         //this->m_main_statusbar->Refresh();
00902 }

01000 void MainFrame::OnDownloadToolClick( wxCommandEvent& /*event*/ )

01003 }
01004 bool MainFrame::DownloadFile()
01005 {
01006         if( !this->GetControls())
01007         {
01008                 return false;
01009         }
01010         wxString cfg_filename= this->m_loaded_doc->GetFilename();
01011         wxString path= _("");
01012         wxString name= _("");
01013         if( !cfg_filename.IsEmpty())
01014         {
01015                 wxFileName::SplitPath( cfg_filename, &path, &name, NULL);
01016         }
01017         wxString filename= wxFileSelector( 
01018                 _("Select the output file to write into flash ..."), 
01019                 path,
01020                 name, 
01021                 _("txt"),
01022                 _("Output files (*.txt)|*.txt|All files (*.*)|*.*"), 
01023                 wxOPEN| wxFILE_MUST_EXIST, 
01024                 this);
01025         if( filename.IsEmpty())
01026                 return false;
01027         
01028         // select board
01029         GenericBoard* board= ( GenericBoard *)this->m_pllset_board_type_control->GetClientData( this->m_pllset_board_type_control->GetSelection());
01030 
01031         // Download the file 
01032         if( !board->DownLoadFile( filename, this->m_loaded_doc->GetBoardBaseAddress()))
01033         {
01034                 wxLogError( _("Some errors occurred during PLL file writing !"));
01035                 return false;
01036         }
01037         wxMessageBox( 
01038                 _("PLL file written correctly !"), 
01039                 _( "PLL file writing ..."), 
01040                 wxOK| wxICON_INFORMATION,
01041                 this);
01042         return true;
01043 }
01044 
01045 bool MainFrame::MakeDownloadFile()
01046 {
01047         if( !this->GetControls())
01048         {
01049                 return false;
01050         }
01051 
01052         wxString cfg_filename= this->m_loaded_doc->GetFilename();
01053         wxString path= _("");
01054         wxString name= _("");
01055         if( !cfg_filename.IsEmpty())
01056         {
01057                 wxFileName::SplitPath( cfg_filename, &path, &name, NULL);
01058         }
01059         wxString filename= wxFileSelector( 
01060                 _("Select the output file to be created ..."), 
01061                 path,
01062                 name, 
01063                 _("txt"),
01064                 _("Output files (*.txt)|*.txt|All files (*.*)|*.*"), 
01065                 wxSAVE| wxOVERWRITE_PROMPT, 
01066                 this);
01067         if( filename.IsEmpty())
01068                 return false;
01069 
01070         GenericBoard *board= ( GenericBoard *)this->m_pllset_board_type_control->GetClientData( this->m_pllset_board_type_control->GetSelection());
01071         return board->MakeDownloadFile( filename, *this->m_loaded_doc);
01072 }
01073 
01074 void MainFrame::UpdateOutput()
01075 {
01076         this->m_main_statusbar->Refresh();
01077 
01078         GenericBoard *board= ( GenericBoard *)this->m_pllset_board_type_control->GetClientData( this->m_pllset_board_type_control->GetSelection());
01079         this->m_updating= true;
01080         // Update Output frequency 
01081         float input_freq;
01082         if( this->m_pllset_clkmod_control->GetSelection()== 0)
01083         {
01084                 // PLL mode: get it from CLK2 (internal source)
01085                 wxString item= this->m_pllset_vcxo_type_control->GetStringSelection();
01086                 double val= 0;
01087                 if( !item.Length()) {
01088                         this->m_updating= false;
01089                         return;
01090                 }
01091                 if( !item.ToDouble( &val)) {
01092                         wxMessageBox( _("The input clock value was not correctly formatted."), wxT("CAENPLLConfig"), wxOK | wxCENTRE | wxICON_ERROR  );
01093                         this->m_updating= false;
01094                         return;
01095                 }
01096                 input_freq= (float) val;
01097                 float clkin= (float) this->m_pllset_clkin_dblcontrol->GetValue();
01098                 int R, N;
01099                 float f_pfd= board->GetPFDFreqMHz();
01100                 float f_pfd_tolerance= board->GetPFDFreqToleranceMHz();
01101                 if( !GenericBoard::ApproximateFin( clkin, input_freq, f_pfd, f_pfd_tolerance, R, N)){
01102                         //wxMessageBox( _("Cannot get a valid dividers set and/or PFD frequency for the specified input clock value."), wxT("CAENPLLConfig"), wxOK | wxCENTRE | wxICON_ERROR  );
01103                         this->m_pllset_clkin_label->SetLabel( _("Undefined value"));
01104                         this->m_pllset_clkin_label->SetForegroundColour( wxColour( 255, 0, 0));
01105                         this->m_updating= false;
01106                         return;
01107                 }
01108                 // Show clock in 
01109                 this->m_pllset_clkin_label->SetLabel( wxString::Format( "%0.4f MHz", clkin));
01110                 if( fabs( clkin- this->m_pllset_clkin_dblcontrol->GetValue())> 0.000001) {
01111                         this->m_pllset_clkin_label->SetForegroundColour( wxColour( 255, 0, 0));
01112                 } else {
01113                         this->m_pllset_clkin_label->SetForegroundColour( wxColour( 0, 0, 0));
01114                 }
01115         }
01116         else
01117         {
01118                 // Bypass mode: get it from input control
01119                 input_freq= this->m_pllset_clkin_dblcontrol->GetValue();
01120                 // Show clock in 
01121                 this->m_pllset_clkin_label->SetLabel( wxString::Format( "%0.4f MHz", input_freq));
01122                 this->m_pllset_clkin_label->SetForegroundColour( wxColour( 0, 0, 0));
01123         }
01124 
01125         // ADC Freq
01126         // Calculate the allowed adc frequencies
01127         wxString adc_freq_org_val= this->m_pllset_adcfreq_choice->GetStringSelection();
01128         // free up values77
01129         this->m_pllset_adcfreq_choice->Clear();
01130         for( int i= 1; i<= 32; i++) {
01131                 float freq= input_freq/ i;
01132                 if( ( freq> board->GetMaxFreq())|| 
01133                         ( freq< board->GetMinFreq())) {
01134                         // value out of board range
01135                         continue;
01136                 }
01137                 // Add value to list
01138                 this->m_pllset_adcfreq_choice->Append( wxString::Format( "%0.4f MHz", freq), new IntClientData( i));
01139         }
01140         if( !this->m_pllset_adcfreq_choice->SetStringSelection( adc_freq_org_val)) {
01141                 this->m_pllset_adcfreq_choice->SetSelection( 0);
01142         }
01143 
01144         // Clock Out Freq
01145         // Calculate the allowed clockout frequencies
01146         wxString clkout_freq_org_val= this->m_pllset_clkoutfreq_choice->GetStringSelection();
01147         // free up values
01148         this->m_pllset_clkoutfreq_choice->Clear();
01149         for( int i= 1; i<= 32; i++) {
01150                 float freq= input_freq/ i;
01151                 // Add value to list
01152                 this->m_pllset_clkoutfreq_choice->Append( wxString::Format( "%0.4f MHz", freq), new IntClientData( i));
01153         }
01154         if( !this->m_pllset_clkoutfreq_choice->SetStringSelection( clkout_freq_org_val)) {
01155                 this->m_pllset_clkoutfreq_choice->SetSelection( 0);
01156         }
01157 
01158         // Output delay
01159         // Calculate the allowed output delay values
01160         wxString delay_org_val= this->m_pllset_clkoutdelay_choice->GetStringSelection();
01161         // free up values
01162         this->m_pllset_clkoutdelay_choice->Clear();
01163         for( int i= 0; i<= 31; i++) {
01164                 double calc_delay_ps= (double)i* ( board->GetClockOutDelayStepNS()* 1000.0)+ ( board->GetClockOutDelayBaseNS()* 1000.0);
01165                 if( calc_delay_ps>= 1000)
01166                         // Show as nS
01167                         this->m_pllset_clkoutdelay_choice->Append( wxString::Format( "%0.2f nS", calc_delay_ps* 0.001), new IntClientData( i));
01168                 else
01169                         // Show as pS
01170                         this->m_pllset_clkoutdelay_choice->Append( wxString::Format( "%0.2f pS", calc_delay_ps), new IntClientData( i));
01171         }
01172         if( !this->m_pllset_clkoutdelay_choice->SetStringSelection( delay_org_val)) {
01173                 this->m_pllset_clkoutdelay_choice->SetSelection( 0);
01174         }
01175 
01176         this->m_updating= false;
01177 }

01183 void MainFrame::OnPllsetClkoutdelayenCheckboxClick( wxCommandEvent& /*event */)
01184 {
01185         this->m_pllset_clkoutdelay_choice->Enable( this->m_pllset_clkoutdelayen_control->GetValue()&& this->m_pllset_clkouten_control->GetValue());
01186 }

01193 void MainFrame::OnPllsetVcxoTypeChoiceSelected( wxCommandEvent& /*event */)
01194 {
01195         if( this->m_updating)
01196                 return;
01197         this->SetDirty( true);
01198         this->UpdateOutput();
01199 }

01201 
01206 void MainFrame::OnPllsetReadVcxoTypeButtonClick( wxCommandEvent& /*event */)
01207 {
01208         unsigned long board_addr;
01209         if( !this->m_pllset_board_base_addr_control->GetValue().ToULong( &board_addr, 16))
01210         {
01211                 wxLogError( _("Invalid board base address !"));
01212                 return;
01213         }
01214 
01215         // Read the VCXO type from board
01216         GenericBoard *board= ( GenericBoard *)this->m_pllset_board_type_control->GetClientData( this->m_pllset_board_type_control->GetSelection());
01217 
01218         int vcxo_type= 0;
01219         if( !board->ReadVCXOType( vcxo_type, board_addr)) {
01220                 wxMessageBox( _("Error reading VCXO type from board."), wxT("CAENPLLConfig"), wxOK | wxCENTRE | wxICON_ERROR  );
01221                 return;
01222         }
01223         int freq= 0;
01224         if( !board->GetVCXOFreq( vcxo_type, freq)){
01225                 wxMessageBox( _("Unknown VCXO type. Please update your settings' file."), wxT("CAENPLLConfig"), wxOK | wxCENTRE | wxICON_ERROR  );
01226                 return;
01227         }
01228         if( !this->m_pllset_vcxo_type_control->SetStringSelection( wxString::Format("%d", freq))) {
01229                 wxMessageBox( _("Unknown VCXO type. Please update your settings' file."), wxT("CAENPLLConfig"), wxOK | wxCENTRE | wxICON_ERROR  );
01230                 return;
01231         }
01232         this->UpdateOutput();
01233 }

01273 bool MainFrame::SelectByData( wxChoice* p_ctrl, int val) {
01274         for( unsigned int i= 0; i< p_ctrl->GetCount(); i++) {
01275                 if( ((IntClientData* )p_ctrl->GetClientObject( i))->GetVal()== val) {
01276                         p_ctrl->SetSelection( i);
01277                         return true;
01278                 }
01279         }
01280         return false;
01281 }
